page.title: 15The Mayor of Sandwich
page.content: The present Mayor,Mr.R.R.Chesterfield has been Mayor three times in 1972,1973 and 1985.When Sandwich changed from a borough to a town he had less authority over planning and travelled less in a smaller area.The town of Sandwich owns alot of regalia used by the mayor which includes three silver-gilt maces(the two smaller ones were made in 1435. In 1457 some French from Honfleur invaded Sandwich and the Mayor was killed.Now Honfleur is Sandwich's twin town. The Mayor attends civic functions in the town and he is the President of many organisations.He visits people of the town:the old,sick and young.He attends three major Church services each year on Mayor's Sunday,Battle of Britain Sunday and Armistice Sunday.He has a personal chaplain to deal with his spiritual needs.
